message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to own this incredible product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,800,000. I believe this reflects its true worth and the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $1,800,000. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you countering and recognizing the value of this product.  While $1,800,000 represents its full potential, I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. I believe this price point offers a fair balance between its worth and your investment.

I understand your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,500,000 for the product. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering its value and my budget.
